Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.index.schema

Class IndexUpdateStorage<KEY extends NativeIndexKey<KEY>,​VALUE extends NativeIndexValue>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.impl.index.schema.SimpleEntryStorage<IndexEntryUpdate<?>,​IndexUpdateCursor<KEY,​VALUE>>
      • org.neo4j.kernel.impl.index.schema.IndexUpdateStorage<KEY,​VALUE>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    public class IndexUpdateStorage<KEY extends NativeIndexKey<KEY>,​VALUE extends NativeIndexValue>
extends SimpleEntryStorage<IndexEntryUpdate<?>,​IndexUpdateCursor<KEY,​VALUE>>
    Buffer IndexEntryUpdate by writing them out to a file. Can be read back in insert order through SimpleEntryStorage.reader().

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add​(IndexEntryUpdate<?> update,
                PageCursor pageCursor)
         throws IOException
        Description copied from class: SimpleEntryStorage
        DON'T CALL THIS METHOD DIRECTLY. Instead, use SimpleEntryStorage.add(Object). Write entry to pageCursor. Implementor of this method is responsible for calling SimpleEntryStorage.prepareWrite(int) before actually start writing.
        Specified by:
        add in class SimpleEntryStorage<IndexEntryUpdate<?>,​IndexUpdateCursor<KEY extends NativeIndexKey<KEY>,​VALUE extends NativeIndexValue>>
        Throws:
        IOException

      • reader

        public IndexUpdateCursor<KEY,​VALUE> reader​(PageCursor pageCursor)
        Description copied from class: SimpleEntryStorage
        DON'T CALL THIS METHOD DIRECTLY. Instead use SimpleEntryStorage.reader(). Return SimpleEntryStorage responsible for deserializing wrapping provided PageCursor, pointing to head of file.
        Specified by:
        reader in class SimpleEntryStorage<IndexEntryUpdate<?>,​IndexUpdateCursor<KEY extends NativeIndexKey<KEY>,​VALUE extends NativeIndexValue>>
